entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM
[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQR.IFRS.0080.8799] ifrs-full:ProceedsFromSalesOfIntangibleAssetsClassifiedAsInvestingActivities has a value of -100,000 which is less than zero. This element should not have a negative value.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ProceedsFromSalesOfIntangibleAssetsClassifiedAsInvestingActivities fact are: Period :2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/724500UL634GFV1KYF10/2021-12-31/ESEF/NL/0/724500UL634GFV1KYF10-2021-12-31-en.zip/724500UL634GFV1KYF10-2021-12-31-en/reports/724500UL634GFV1KYF10-2021-12-31-en.xhtml 18974

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of [00010] - Statement - Income Statement but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0129.9625] It is expected that ProfitLossAttributableToOwnersOfParent with a value of 29,600,000 reported in the network role http://vopak.com/role/IncomeStatement should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, ProfitLoss with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParentMember and a reported value of 294,600,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://vopak.com/role/ChangesinEquity. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToOwnersOfParent fact are:
Period : 2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of ProfitLossAttributableToOwnersOfParent : -5 Decimals of ProfitLoss : -5 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/724500UL634GFV1KYF10/2021-12-31/ESEF/NL/0/724500UL634GFV1KYF10-2021-12-31-en.zip/724500UL634GFV1KYF10-2021-12-31-en/reports/724500UL634GFV1KYF10-2021-12-31-en.xhtml 18974
